name: Charlie E. Hughes
content: CHARLES E. HUGHES charles.hughes@ucf.edu Pegasus Professor Emeritus Retired, Computer Science Secondary Appointments: Electrical and Computer Engineering College of Community Innovation and Education Nicholson School of Communication and Media School of Modeling, Simulation & Training Founder, Synthetic Reality Lab at IST in Partnership III, Research Park TeachLivE Principal: TeachLivE Co-Founder, Center for Research in Education Simulation Technology (CREST) Co-Founder, Learning Science Faculty Cluster Member, Disability, Aging & Technology Cluster Teaching Interests Computer Science I (Data Structures) Undergraduate (COP3502H) -- Notes are on Webcourses Computer Science II (Algorithm Design and Analysis) Undergraduate (COP3503H) Compiler Construction/ Systems Programming Undergraduate (COP3402) Algorithm Design and Analysis Graduate (COT5405) -- Notes are on Webcourses Augmented Reality Engineering Graduate (CAP6110) -- Syllabus at https://ucf.simplesyllabus.com/en-US/doc/vffigiv47/Fall-2024-CAP-6110-0V01-?mode=view Theory of Computation Undergraduate (COT4210) Graduate (COT6410) -- Additional Notes are linked from this site and many can also be found on Webcourses Concepts of Parallel and Distributed Processing Resume Detailed CV Research Interests Virtual Learning Environments Virtual Companions for Members of Neurodivergent Communities Human-Centered Computing Affective Computing Application of VR Experiences to Interpersonal Skills Development Theory of Computation Sample Projects DebriefScape TeachLivE RAISE What Really Matters in Life CS home | Contact Me | UCF home | Department of Computer Science 4328 Scorpius Street University of Central Florida Orlando, FloridaÂ  32816-2362 Last Updated:November 10, 2025
